NavigateEventDownloadRequest.summary:
The downloadRequest read-only property of the
interface returns the filename of the file requested for download, in the case of a download navigation (e.g. an {{htmlelement("a")}} or {{htmlelement("area")}} element with a download attribute), or null otherwise.

remarks.para:
-Modern client-side routing: the Navigation API
-Navigation API explainer
-Domenic Denicola's Navigation API live demo

NavigateEventDownloadRequest.value: A string containing the filename of the file requested for download, or null.
